Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-28737 affecting package shim for versions less than 15.8-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-28737 affecting package shim for versions less than 15.8-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package shim is earlier than 15.8-1, affected by CVE-2022-28737
